Config {
    net: IpConfigs {
        v4: Ipv4Conf {
            enabled: true,
            min_prefix: 8,
        },
        v6: Ipv6Conf {
            enabled: true,
            min_prefix: 16,
        },
    },
    default_policy: "accept",
    block_policy: "drop",
    iifname: [
        "eth0",
    ],
    set_names: SetNames {
        whitelist: "whitelist",
        blacklist: "blacklist",
        abuselist: "abuselist",
        country: "country",
    },
    logging: LogConfig {
        enabled: true,
        level: "debug",
        ratelimiting: true,
        rate: 10,
        burst: 5,
    },
    sources: Sources {
        asn: AsnSources {
            v4: [
                "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ipverse/asn-ip/master/as/{asn}/ipv4-aggregated.txt",
            ],
            v6: [
                "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ipverse/asn-ip/master/as/{asn}/ipv6-aggregated.txt",
            ],
        },
        country: CountrySources {
            v4: [
                "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/herrbischoff/country-ip-blocks/master/ipv4/{country}.cidr",
            ],
            v6: [
                "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/herrbischoff/country-ip-blocks/master/ipv6/{country}.cidr",
            ],
        },
    },
    whitelist: None,
    blacklist: None,
    abuselist: Some(
        {
            V4: [
                Detailed {
                    url: "file://tests/testdata/ipv4-test.netset",
                    min_prefix: Some(
                        0,
                    ),
                    trusted: None,
                },
                Simple(
                    "file://tests/testdata/bogus.txt",
                ),
            ],
        },
    ),
    country_list: None,
}
